name: Gene-o-cide 0.1
description:
Move with arrow keys, shoot and aim with mouse (look with right mouse button)

This is the second playable version presented as one of my final requirements for CIS subject in March 13. A minor update (simple graphical effects) was made to the current version.

Consists of 1 short mission, 3 enemy variations, and 1 hidden power-up.

There are no sound, background, and particle effects included in this release. Minor glitches are also present.
